[devshell.modules]
rpmcvspackage = devshell.modules.rpmcvspackage:RpmCvsPackage

port = devshell.modules.port:Port

freejport = devshell.modules.freejport:FreeJPort
hackage = devshell.modules.hackage:Hackage
source = devshell.modules.source:Source
build = devshell.modules.build:Build
revisorport = devshell.modules.revisorport:RevisorPort
mail = devshell.modules.mail:Mail
foo = devshell.modules.fedorahostedgitport:Foo
mock = devshell.modules.mock:Mock
profile = devshell.modules.profile:Profile
sourceball = devshell.modules.sourceball:SourceBall
fedorahostedgitport = devshell.modules.fedorahostedgitport:FedoraHostedGitPort
audit = devshell.modules.audit:Audit
darcs = devshell.modules.darcs:Darcs
revisioncontrol = devshell.modules.revisioncontrol:RevisionControl

builder = devshell.modules.mock:Builder

[console_scripts]

ports = devshell.ports:main
